description:
As the girls prepare for the annual school sporting competition, the girls discover that their weird teacher, Kimura, has a wife and a daughter!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Familie Kimura / Hast du das gesehen? / Unerkannte Ehefrau / Sieg um jeden Preis / Nur die Zahlen zählen
Kimura Ke no Hitobito / Mita Mita? / Mikakunin Oku-san / Gachi Gachi / Kekka Happyou
Kimuran perheen jäsenet - Näitkö tuon? - Salaperäinen vaimo - Jäätynyt - Päätösilmoitus
Members of the Kimura Family / Did You See? Did You See? / Unidentified Wife / Nervous Wreck / The Numbers Are In
